name: Executioner Sword
description:
Sword designed specifically for decapitation in gruesome rituals

name: Health Amulet
description:
Golden amulet with red jewel imbued in magic

Grants 1 additional live

name: Mana Ring
description:
Golden Ring with blue jewel imbued in magic

Grants 10% more mana

name: Idol of Haste
description:
Small totem of long forgotten god of haste carved from magic wood

Boosts movement speed by 25%

name: Coward's Sword
description:
Said to be worn by the most cowardly fighters across the land

Boosts damage by 10% while on full lives

name: Coward's Shield
description:
Said to be worn by the most cowardly fighters across the land

Creates barrier that negates all damage while healing

name: Thorned Rose
description:
The Thorned Rose is a beautiful rose-shaped ornament, with its petals made of a rare, enchanted material that imbues it with magical properties

When damage is taken shoots out thorns inflicting damage upon enemies
